ScoreCounter.title: Score calculator for truck loaders
ScoreCounter.startat-dsc: Sets the hour and minute at which your score began counting down.
ScoreCounter.addpall-dsc: Adds the next pallets You've loaded to update the score calculation.
ScoreCounter.finishcalc-dsc: Resets the calculation of Your score.
ScoreCounter.pauseresume-dsc: Pauses/Resumes the calculation of Your score (useful when You go on Your break).
